QuestData.Title: Enough Damage For One Day
QuestData.Description: We do not have any further strategic need for Thorg'izog or the Blackrock ground troops. We must continue to the next phase of the plan.$b$bWhen you are finished at the stronghold, return to my son and me, here in Chiselgrip.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Return to Chiselgrip. We move on soon.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Eitrigg at Chiselgrip in Burning Steppes.
QuestData.RewardText: Are you alright?$b$bGood. You were strong out there, $n. Strong, and wise.$b$bNow pack up your things. We're moving out of here.
